com.communote.server.core.mail

Interface MailSender

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MailSenderImpl

    public interface MailSender
    Component for sending mails. The mail sender converts MailMessages into MimeMessages and uses a MimeMessageSender to transport them.
    Author:
    Communote team - http://communote.github.io/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void send(MailMessage message)
      Send the given message.
      boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings)
      Test the given mail-out configuration.
      boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings, MailMessage testMessage)
      Test the given mail-out configuration and send a test message.
      void updateSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings)
      Update the mail-out configuration so that subsequent calls to send(MailMessage) will use the new settings.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(MailMessage message)
   throws MailingException
        Send the given message.
        Parameters:
        message -
        Throws:
        MailingException - in case there was an error sending the message

      • testSettings

        boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings)
        Test the given mail-out configuration. Depending on the used MimeMessageSender this might include a connection test with the server.
        Parameters:
        settings - the settings to test
        Returns:
        true if the settings were tested successfully, false otherwise. Occurred exceptions will be logged.

      • testSettings

        boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings,
                     MailMessage testMessage)
        Test the given mail-out configuration and send a test message.
        Parameters:
        settings - the settings to test
        testMessage - the test message to send
        Returns:
        true if the settings were tested successfully and the test message was sent without error, false otherwise. Occurred exceptions will be logged.

      • updateSettings

        void updateSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings)
             throws ConfigurationUpdateException
        Update the mail-out configuration so that subsequent calls to send(MailMessage) will use the new settings. This method won't test the settings for validity.
        Parameters:
        settings - the new configuration
        Throws:
        ConfigurationUpdateException - in case the configuration could not be updated
